channel.title: ?paki

channel.title: T?ku Reo
channel.desc: Professor John Moorfield's M?ori language course supported by an interactive website. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tapuwae Leave Only Footprints
channel.desc: Pio Terei is on a journey to discover M?ori and Hawaiian indigenous connections through tourism. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Nomad
channel.desc: Kahu journeys from Bruce Bay to Auckland to receive his moko. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Ao with Moana
channel.desc: Current affairs series that puts a M?ori lens on issues that distinguishes it from other current affairs programmes. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hari With The M?ori Side Steps
channel.desc: Skits, sitcom and song in this classic M?ori showband style of comedy. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Beyond Matariki
channel.desc: Join Professor Rangi Matamua as he talks to the Raumati season. We talk about the signs of each lunar month that make up this season. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mataora Digital
channel.desc: Amazing content curated for rangatahi, wh?nau and pakeke. Made by the Mataora team. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tagata Pasifika 2025
channel.desc: The show made by Pacific people, for Pacific people - The Pacific voice on New Zealand television since 1987. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Huhu - Te Tunga R?kau
channel.desc: Huhu is a show for preschoolders, featuring reo M?ori stories and highlighting M?ori perspectives. 6 tapes (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Huhu - Te Tunga R?kau
channel.desc: Huhu is a show for preschoolders, featuring reo M?ori stories and highlighting M?ori perspectives. 6 tapes (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: Kura is furious that they have lost the godstick again and tries her best to stop her sister and Josh from making a deal with Hikuroa. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: After crashing down into a valley of lava streams, Kura is determined to find a way back up the cliff and get their godstick back from. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: After a narrow escape, Kura realises she has no choice and sets off to find a way through the treacherous lava streams towards the misty maunga. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. The tupu are dying and Tai pushes past her fear of her matakitetanga. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. The kids prank Grace to leave their farm. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. Tai tries to figure out why the tupu are still dying. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Chatham Islanders
channel.desc: Over the years looking out for each other has become a way of life for the islanders. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Marae
channel.desc: Your way into the M?ori world. M?iatanga, Whanaungatanga, Manaakitanga - We bring you stories with heart.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Moon Tide Fishing
channel.desc: Presenter Nore Martin shows when and where to fish according to the M?ori lunar calendar. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Native Ride
channel.desc: A handful of unforgettable M?ori characters stride out on a 100-day quest to tame a totally wild Ruatahuna horse for a grand competition in this stunning and poignant series. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tales From Zambia
channel.desc: Explore Zambia's diverse wildlife, from majestic elephants to playful baboons, through this captivating collection. Venture into breathtaking habitats and witness fascinating animal behaviours.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Michif Country
channel.desc: A glimpse into the St. Laurent M?tis nation on Lake Manitoba, taking viewers on a journey with the most active and talented hunters, trappers, and fishermen in the community.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hunting Aotearoa
channel.desc: Join skilled hunter-gatherer, Peter Peeti, for another exciting hunting season. This week's travels have brought Pete to the West Coast of the South Island, Franz Josef. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Only In Aotearoa
channel.desc: Short and sharp comedy skits from a M?ori perspective. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: East Coast Rising
channel.desc: Ex All Black winger Hosea Gear returns home to coach the Ng?ti Porou East Coast Heartland rugby team. Can the team achieve their first win in 8 years? (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kori Club
channel.desc: Kori Club is a captivating series for 0-8-year-olds that marries the charm of "The Wiggles" with the magic of Te Ao M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?hura
channel.desc: Niua and Hura travel to Whang?rei to uncover the story behind the sacred maunga Parihaka. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?karo Tribe
channel.desc: Ta?karo Tribe is an animated series for 0 - 6 year olds. We follow our cute characters as they enter the magical Alphabet Forest where our talking Papa Rakau and Talking Pond Koka? live. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Darwin and Newts
channel.desc: An animated series for youngsters who love to figure out how things work. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: While Kura, Josh and Kazumi follow a trail of maero footprints, Rangi is playing games with rangatira o patupaiarehe on top of the misty maunga. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube
channel.desc: Two clever cousins, Atareta and Te Haakura, share their world with their followers. (R).

channel.title: Kia Mau
channel.desc: A fun sing-along M?ori performing arts series for children. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tamariki Haka
channel.desc: Children from kura across the country showcase their haka skills. (R).

channel.title: East Coast Rising
channel.desc: The community comes together for the tangi of East Coast legend Ben Kaiwai. They also rally together for the next generation to provide lunches to the local kura. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Empowered
channel.desc: Follow female race car driver Vivien Keszthelyi as she attempts the transition from touring cars to formula cars. (R).

channel.title: Marae

channel.title: Karanga The First Voice
channel.desc: Ten iwi around the motu explore and celebrate karanga in contemporary Aotearoa. (R).

channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Wharekura. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Tamariki learn well-known waiata and haka from Ng? Puna o Waiorea, Te Wharekura o Hoani Waititi Marae and Te Wharekura o R?kaumangamanga. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Pathfinders
channel.desc: Pio Terei, celebrated for his uplifting portrayal of M?ori through humour and entertainment, shares his personal story of comedy and processing grief as he takes us home to Mitimiti. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Autaia Haka Theatre
channel.desc: An exploration of tino rangatiratanga and mana motuhake, Te R?whitiroa unpacks Te Tiriti o Waitangi and He Whakaputanga, calling for the establishment of a M?ori parliament at Waitangi. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Autaia Haka Theatre
channel.desc: A fierce, defiant performance filled with symbolism and fire. Te R?whitiroa makes a clear statement about M?ori sovereignty, identity and unity in a time of political unrest. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ata Toi + Wai
channel.desc: Join the dynamic trio Chey Milne and Tawaroa Kawana as they celebrate music through a distinctly M?ori lens. Tuakoi Ohia shares her creative journey. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Going Native
channel.desc: NEW: Drew hits the ocean to witness a state-of the art ship- safety program for native youths, then sees how indigenous ?controlled burns? can stop forest fires, before visiting Niagara Falls to reveal its vital link to indigenous folks.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Amplify
channel.desc: NEW: Vancouver-based hip-hop royalty, JB The First Lady (Jerilynn Webster, Nuxalk/Onondaga) uplifts and upholds the memories of missing and murdered Indigenous women and girls in this touching tribute to Chelsea Poorman. Directed by Asia Youngman.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: H?kina Te M?nuka
channel.desc: The wh?nau set up a surprise birthday for their Nanny Del. Lead voice of Coco Reo M?ori, M?nuera, and his whanau perform at a screening of the movie. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: H?kina Te M?nuka
channel.desc: In Ahipara, the day prior to the Toit? te Tiriti march, M?nuera presents his assignment on Te Tiriti o Waitangi. And the wh?nau hit the road to Te Rerenga Wairua, to join the cause. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ng? Kaihoe
channel.desc: As important as the waka, are the kaihoe who will man it. We follow them as they prepare for this momentous occasion, starting with land training, involving learning haka, ngeri, and technique. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ng? W?hine
channel.desc: W?hine play a critical role in wh?nau, hap?, and iwi as whare tangata (procreators) and whare matauranga (repositories of knowledge) - but what role do they have in waka taua? (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mahi Tika Ana!
channel.desc: NEW: Hinewai and Hine Te Kura have never been hunting before. It can either be a successful adventure or a tiring one! Follow this episode to see if Te Owai can lead the girls to a boar.

channel.title: Ata Toi + Wai

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: P?kana 2025
channel.desc: Te Reo M?ori entertainment programme for Kura and Kura Kaupapa tamariki / taiohi. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Siblings Eraia and Lahaina Kiel teach basic skills in poi, haka and other traditional M?ori performing arts. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ariki 4
channel.desc: Ariki is a revolutionary M?ori martial arts series where teams of rangatahi battle it out. Based on the ancestral art form, ARIKI was created by Te Whare T? Taua o Aotearoa. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora Wharekura
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Wharekura. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Wairua (Mts)
channel.desc: The topic of wairua will be covered and the question will be answered from a M?ori perspective of ancient times, through to the present. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Waka Huia is an iconic archival series recording the unique stories and histories of Maori for all New Zealanders. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Fresh 2025
channel.desc: Our favourite flavours of the Pacific are presented in a Fresh Poly-platter in this series dedicated to inspiring Islanders worldwide. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Our Other Islands
channel.desc: Troy talks honey, kawakawa, mussels, snapper and p?ua with the locals and ends up coming full circle as he walks into the past with knowledge of the future, in the Marlborough Sounds. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Kapa Haka o ?p?tiki Mai Tawhiti
channel.desc: Featuring Te Kapa Haka o ?p?tiki Mai Tawhiti, Whakaata M?ori presents Te Matatini o Te K?hui Maunga - the ultimate celebration of haka excellence. This is haka at its finest! (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Not Even
channel.desc: The gang gate-crash Ma's weekly wh?nau dinner. Over the course of the evening, Ma clashes with her mum, Pua gets drunk, and Taaps and Tawhiti have an incident involving a water blaster. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Queer and Here
channel.desc: A fresh, new provocative factual series that will challenge, educate and entertain the audience. Host Aniwa Whaiapu Koloamatangi takes us on an adventurous journey among the queer community. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Under The Wh?riki
channel.desc: NEW: A video podcast confronting kaupapa often silenced or hidden within te ao M?ori. This series lifts the metaphorical wh?riki to expose and explore issues we often shy away from.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ahik?roa
channel.desc: Hemi turns to Thomas for help; Te Ururangi becomes a lost soul; and Mother tells the House of La Renta wh?nau that they will be attending the ball. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Breaking Silence
channel.desc: Paralympic medalist Fiona Southorn shares her powerful story, an inspiration for young ones living with physical challenges and for all individuals living with violence and abuse. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Breaking Silence
channel.desc: In this continuation of her story, Simonne Butler nearly lost her life in a vicious attack by an ex-partner, she shares her incredible journey of recovery and resilience. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K Rd Chronicles
channel.desc: A look at homelessness from the inside. Six, once homeless herself, now a journalist, is our guide to the diverse, harsh and often tragic world of the people living on and around Karangahape Road. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K Rd Chronicles
channel.desc: A look at homelessness from the inside. Six, once homeless herself, now a journalist, is our guide to the diverse, harsh and often tragic world of the people living on and around Karangahape Road. (R).
